snippet: The confession by David Tarloff was played at his trial in the 2008 killing of Kathryn Faughey, an Upper East Side psychologist.
abstract: Jurors watch video-taped confession by David Tarloff at his trial for the 2008 killing of Kathryn Faughney, Upper East Side psychologist.
lead_paragraph: The confession by David Tarloff was played at his trial in the 2008 killing of Kathryn Faughey, an Upper East Side psychologist.

headline.seo: Jurors Hear Tarloff Confess to Killing Psychologist
headline.main: Jurors Hear Man Confess to Killing a Therapist
headline.print_headline: Jurors Hear Man Confess To the Killing Of a Therapist
